verbs.description: There [V: are] [ARG1: many uncontested facts that suggest Trump is an extraordinary threat to our democracy and constitutional order] . We see no reason for delay .
There are [ARG0: many uncontested facts] [R-ARG0: that] [V: suggest] [ARG1: Trump is an extraordinary threat to our democracy and constitutional order] . We see no reason for delay .
There are many uncontested facts that suggest [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: an extraordinary threat to our democracy and constitutional order] . We see no reason for delay .
There are many uncontested facts that suggest Trump is an extraordinary threat to our democracy and constitutional order . [ARG0: We] [V: see] [ARG1: no reason for delay] .
